text: Víctor Torres Funes (born 31 January 1967) is a Spanish rugby union player. He played as prop. ==Career== His first international cap was during a test match against Germany, at Heidelberg, on 26 April 1998. He was in the 1999 Rugby World Cup roster, playing two matches. ==External links== * Víctor Torres international statistics Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby union props Category:Spain international rugby union players Category:Spanish rugby union players
title: Víctor Torres (rugby union)
